headline: 'The real problem is that our leaders are dumb': Trump blasts Biden over Putin's invasion of Ukraine boasting that it wouldn't have happened on his watch - as he teases a 2024 run

Anthony Gonzalez, an impeachment backer, and Kelly Tshibaka, taking on Republican Sen. Lisa Murkowski, who said Trump should be convicted for inciting an insurrection.
